definition: Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei
Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan

sentences.english: This is all but the revival of Alexandrian thought.
sentences.chinese: 这是所有的，但复兴亚历山大思想。

sentences.english: This paper is based on the project of the huge shield tunnel a cross the Huangpu River, linking East Fuxing Road in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 以上海复兴东路大型越江盾构隧道为工程背景。

sentences.english: I live at 168 South Fuxingmen Street.
sentences.chinese: 复兴门南大街一六八号。

sentences.english: A resurgent China will be problematical in a number of ways.
sentences.chinese: 一个复兴的中国肯定会有很多方面出问题。

sentences.english: The World Bank's full name is the International Bank for Reco truction and Development.
sentences.chinese: 世界银行的全称是国际复兴与开发银行。

sentences.english: Shen Yinmo is closely related to the revival of modern Chinese calligraphic culture.
sentences.chinese: 沈尹默与现代中国书法文化复兴是紧密相联的。

sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗马洛是文艺复兴时期英国戏剧的杰出代表。

sentences.english: That Later Renaissance is a complicated historical term. W. J.
sentences.chinese: 后期文艺复兴是一个比较复杂的史学概念。

sentences.english: Would it be possible to rebuild and perhaps restore Cybertron to its former glory?
sentences.chinese: 塞伯坦能够得以重建，复兴昔日的辉煌吗？

sentences.english: At first the artists of the Renaissance only had single-point perspective.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，文艺复兴时期的画家们只会运用单点透视。

sentences.english: Neoplatonism was one of the important thoughts of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 新柏拉图主义是文艺复兴时期重要思想之一。

sentences.english: Yan felt that the first step should be a 'national rejuvenation' policy.
sentences.chinese: 阎的观点是中国第一步应该采取“民族复兴”政策。

sentences.english: Russi a's sense of resurgence is mixed with a deeply rooted inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 复兴俄罗斯的感情混合着一种根深蒂固的自卑感。

sentences.english: The Renaissance and Humanism: Humanism is the key-note of the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 文艺复兴，提倡理性，人文主义。

sentences.english: The QING Dynasty was the era of literature renaissance in Heluo Area.
sentences.chinese: 清代为河洛地区文学的复兴时期。

sentences.english: Revive Wuhan, be person of 60 million Hubei expect.
sentences.chinese: 复兴武汉，是六千万湖北人的期盼。

definition: Zhengxing district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
to rise abruptly (to a towering position)/to tower over/to spring up/to emerge suddenly/the emergence (e.g. of a power)
to fall/to drop/to decline/to deteriorate/to go downhill
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
